title: PAU Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Senior Lab and Field Helper Post
description: Punjab Agricultural University (PAU) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Lab and Field Helper Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the PAU Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the application form on or before the l...
